opis2: Dr. Hui Zhang, also known as Jeffery, earned his Ph.D. in Chinese Medicine from Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine (CDUTCM) in 2017. Following his studies, he relocated to Denmark, where he regularly shares his expertise in TCM across Austria, Denmark, Germany, Poland, and various European countries. Dr. Zhang actively practices TCM in his private clinic in Denmark and maintains strong professional connections with researchers in China, Europe, and the United States.  With a prolific publication record of over 50 papers, Dr. Zhang's research and publications have made a significant impact in the field. His research interests encompass both ancient and modern acupuncture styles, as well as TCM treatments for neurological and mental disorders.
